name: Chocolate Bar
description:
Chocolate Bar is an entry to My First Game Winter 2019.

It's currently in a very rough state right now! I lost the time I earmarked to write it, so the version currently uploaded's story is in a very..uh...patchy state.

Thanks for taking a look at it and I hope you'll drop by as I continue to develop it!\

Change Log:

2/16/2019- Alpha Build uploaded
